series.label: Workers
series.y: 100 - 100 * val(Workers, consumptionValue, t-11...t, sum) / val(Workers, wage, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: Shareholders
series.y: 100 - 100 * val(Shareholders, consumptionValue, t-11...t, sum) / (val(Shareholders, dividends, t-11...t, sum) + val(Shareholders, capitalAppreciation, t-11...t, sum))

series.label: Imitations
series.y: val(Sector1, imitation, t-11...t, sum) + val(Sector2, imitation, t-11...t, sum)

chart.title: Labour Market
chart.info: Vue synthétique du marché du travail.

series.label: Capacity
series.y: val(Sector1, capacity, t, sum) + val(Sector2, capacity, t, sum)

series.label: Demand
series.y: val(Sector1, workforceTarget, t, sum) + val(Sector2, workforceTarget, t, sum)

series.label: Workforce
series.y: val(Sector1, workforce, t, sum) + val(Sector2, workforce, t, sum)

series.label: Average
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, liabilities, t, sum) / val(Sector1, assets, t, sum)

series.label: Target
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, debtRatioTarget, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: Weighted
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, liabilitiesTarget, t, sum) / val(Sector1, assets, t, sum)

chart.title: Firm Sizes
chart.info: La taille des firmes, mesurée en nombre de machines.

series.label: Average
series.y: val(Sector1, capacity, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: Vacancies vs Wage Inflation
series.x: 100 * (val(Sector1, productionVolume, t-11...t, sum) / val(Sector1, productionMax, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, productionVolume, t-11...t, sum) / val(Sector2, productionMax, t-11...t, sum))

series.label: Vacancies vs Wage Inflation
series.x: val(Sector1, capacity, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, capacity, t-11...t, sum)

chart.title: Capital to Capacity Output Ratio (v)
chart.info: The capital to capacity output ratio

series.label: Total
series.y: val(Shareholders, dividends, t-11...t, sum) + val(Shareholders, capitalAppreciation, t-11...t, sum)

chart.title: Survivability
chart.info: Capacité du capital fixe à se reproduire

chart.title: Labour Market
chart.info: Vue synthétique du marché du travail.

series.label: Capacity
series.y: val(Sector1, capacity, t, sum) + val(Sector2, capacity, t, sum)

series.label: Demand
series.y: val(Sector1, workforceTarget, t, sum) + val(Sector2, workforceTarget, t, sum)

series.label: Workforce
series.y: val(Sector1, workforce, t, sum) + val(Sector2, workforce, t, sum)

series.label: Shortage
series.y: 100 - 100 * val(Sector1, salesValue, t, sum) / ( val(Sector1, investmentBudget, t, sum) + val(Sector2, investmentBudget, t, sum) )

series.label: Shortage
series.y: 100 - 100 * (val(Workers, consumptionValue, t, sum) + val(Shareholders, consumptionValue, t, sum)) / ( val(Workers, consumptionBudget, t, sum) + val(Shareholders, consumptionBudget, t, sum) )

series.label: Firms
series.y: 100 * (val(Sector1, money, t, sum) + val(Sector2, money, t, sum)) / val(Banks, liabilities, t, sum)

series.label: Workers
series.y: 100 * val(Workers, money, t, sum) / val(Banks, liabilities, t, sum)

series.label: Shareholders
series.y: 100 * val(Shareholders, money, t, sum) / val(Banks, liabilities, t, sum)

series.label: Imitations
series.y: val(Sector1, imitation, t-11...t, sum) + val(Sector2, imitation, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: Insolvent firms (S1)
series.y: 100 * (1 - val(Sector1, solvent, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum))

series.label: Insolvent firms (S2)
series.y: 100 * (1 - val(Sector2, solvent, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum))

series.label: Bad debtors
series.y: 100 * (val(Sector1, isBadDebtor, t, sum) + val(Sector2, isBadDebtor, t, sum)) / (val(Sector1, count, t, sum) + val(Sector2, count, t, sum))

series.label: Bad debtors (S1)
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, isBadDebtor, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: Bad debtors (S2)
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, isBadDebtor, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum)

series.label: Overdue Debt
series.y: 100 * val(Banks, overdueDebt, t, sum) / val(Banks, assets, t, sum)

series.label: Short Term Debt
series.y: 100 * (val(Banks, shortTermDebt, t, sum) - val(Banks, overdueDebt, t, sum)) / val(Banks, assets, t, sum)

series.label: Long Term Debt
series.y: 100 * val(Banks, longTermDebt, t, sum) / val(Banks, assets, t, sum)

series.label: Capital adequacy ratio
series.y: 100*(1-val(Banks, liabilities, t, sum)/val(Banks, assets, t, sum))

series.label: Overdue debts
series.y: 100*val(Banks, overdueDebt, t, sum)/val(Banks, assets, t, sum)

series.label: Debt Cancellation
series.y: 100*val(Banks, debtCancellationValue, t, sum) / val(Banks, assets, t, sum)

series.label: Observed
series.y: 12 * 100 * (val(Banks, interests, t-11...t, sum) / val(Banks, assets, t-11...t, sum))

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, productionVolume, t-11...t, sum) / val(Sector1, productionMax, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, productionVolume, t-11...t, sum) / val(Sector2, productionMax, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: 100*val(Sector1, canceledDebt, t-11...t, sum) / val(Banks, assets, t-11, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100*val(Sector2, canceledDebt, t-11...t, sum) / val(Banks, assets, t-11, sum)

chart.title: Firm Sizes
chart.info: La taille des firmes, mesurée en nombre de machines.

series.label: Average
series.y: val(Sector1, capacity, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: Average
series.y: val(Sector2, capacity, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: val(Sector1, markup, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: val(Sector2, markup, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, liabilities, t, sum) / val(Sector1, assets, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, liabilities, t, sum) / val(Sector2, assets, t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, liabilitiesTarget, t, sum) / val(Sector1, assets, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, liabilitiesTarget, t, sum) / val(Sector2, assets, t, sum)

panel.title: Sectors

chart.title: Maximum risk
chart.info: Une mesure du risque couru par la banque

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, weightedDebt, t, max) / val(Banks, assets, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, weightedDebt, t, max) / val(Banks, assets, t, sum)

series.label: Ret.
Ret.
series.y: 100 * (&Profit_S2; - val(Sector2, dividends, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, interests, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, depreciation, t-11...t, sum)) / &Profit_S2;

series.label: Mean
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, debtCancellationCount, t, sum) / (t * val(Sector1, count, t, sum))

series.label: Mean
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, debtCancellationCount, t, sum) / (t * val(Sector2, count, t, sum))

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, inventoriesVolume, t, sum) / val(Sector1, inventoriesNormalVolume, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, inventoriesVolume, t, sum) / val(Sector2, inventoriesNormalVolume, t, sum)

panel.chart:
Niveau des stocks inventoriesLevel
t 100*val(Sector1, inventoriesVolume, t, sum) / val(Sector1, inventoriesNormalVolume, t, sum)
t 100*val(Sector1, inventoriesLevel, t, min)
t 100*val(Sector1, inventoriesLevel, t, max)

Niveau des stocks inventoriesLevel
t 100*val(Sector2, inventoriesVolume, t, sum) / val(Sector2, inventoriesNormalVolume, t, sum)
t 100*val(Sector2, inventoriesLevel, t, min)
t 100*val(Sector2, inventoriesLevel, t, max)

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, animalSpirit, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, animalSpirit, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: val(Sector1, inventoryNormalLevel, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: val(Sector2, inventoryNormalLevel, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum)

series.label: Mean
series.y: val(Sector1, recentVacancies, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: Mean
series.y: val(Sector2, recentVacancies, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum)

series.label: Mean
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, normalUtilizationRate, t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t, sum)

series.label: Mean
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, normalUtilizationRate, t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, recentVacancies, t-11...t, sum) / val(Sector1, count, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, recentVacancies, t-11...t, sum) / val(Sector2, count, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: Average
series.y: val(Sector1, wageBill, t, sum) / val(Sector1, workforce, t, sum)

series.label: Average
series.y: val(Sector2, wageBill, t, sum) / val(Sector2, workforce, t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, liabilities, t, sum) / val(Sector1, assets, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, liabilities, t, sum) / val(Sector2, assets, t, sum)

series.label: S1
series.y: val(Sector1, productionVolume, t, sum) / val(Sector1, workforce, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: val(Sector2, productionVolume, t, sum) / val(Sector2, workforce, t, sum)

chart.title: Overhead labour
chart.info: Share of overhead labour in the total wage bill

series.label: S1
series.y: 100 * val(Sector1, overheadExpense, t, sum) / val(Sector1, wageBill, t, sum)

series.label: S2
series.y: 100 * val(Sector2, overheadExpense, t, sum) / val(Sector2, wageBill, t, sum)

series.label: Firms and Banks
series.y: val(Sector1, equities, t, sum) + val(Sector2, equities, t, sum) + val(Banks, equities, t, sum)

series.label: Shareholders Side
series.y: val(Shareholders, dividends, t-11...t, sum) + val(Shareholders, capitalAppreciation, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: Firms Side
series.y: &Profits; - val(Sector1, depreciation, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, depreciation, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: inflation (sector 2 side)
series.y: 100*val(Sector2, salesValue, t, sum) * val(Sector2, salesVolume, t-12, sum) / (val(Sector2, salesVolume, t, sum) * val(Sector2, salesValue, t-12, sum)) - 100

series.label: Firms and Banks Side
Firms and Banks Side (2)
series.y: val(Sector1, equities, t, sum) + val(Sector2, equities, t, sum) + val(Banks, equities, t, sum) - val(Sector1, equities, t-12, sum) - val(Sector2, equities, t-12, sum) - val(Banks, equities, t-12, sum)

series.label: Firms Side
series.y: val(Sector1, canceledDebt, t, sum) + val(Sector2, canceledDebt, t, sum)

series.label: Flows
series.y: val(Sector1, salesValue, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector1, salesCosts, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector1, depreciation, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector1, dividends, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector1, interests, t-11...t, sum) + val(Sector1, canceledDebt, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: Delta Stocks
series.y: val(Sector1, equities, t, sum) - val(Sector1, equities, t-12, sum)

series.label: Flows
series.y: val(Sector2, salesValue, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, salesCosts, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, depreciation, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, dividends, t-11...t, sum) - val(Sector2, interests, t-11...t, sum) + val(Sector2, canceledDebt, t-11...t, sum)

series.label: Delta Stocks
series.y: val(Sector2, equities, t, sum) - val(Sector2, equities, t-12, sum)

panel.title: Performances
panel.html:
Period: t
Simulation duration: duration/1000 s
Instantaneous speed: 1000*speed periods by second
Average speed: 1000*t/duration periods by second
Total memory: totalMemory/1000000 MB
Free memory: freeMemory/1000000 MB
